import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchBar from "../layouts/SearchBar"; import { CardFooter, Button, IconButton } from "@material-tailwind/react"; function Table() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [currentPage,setCurrentPage] = useState(1) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:4000/order/") .then((data) => data.json()) .then((data) => setData(data)) .catch((error) => setData(error)); }, []); return (

); } export default Table;
